summary: Web app project with admin-managed towns module. Currently extending towns module UI (default town selection) from admin-only to all users. Working in phases: frontend UI extension first, then backend integration.
architectural_notes: Towns module currently works fully for admin users (frontend + backend)
Admin-created towns list already exists in backend and used throughout app (e.g., registration)
Default town selection per user (not system-wide)
Favorites functionality removed from towns module
known_issues: Towns module UI only visible to admin users; regular users see old interface
Backend not connected for regular users' town interactions

existing_features.title: Update MyTownsPage component to display the same towns interface for all authenticated users, removing any admin-only conditional rendering or access checks that currently restrict the UI to admin users only

Display the towns list and default town selection dropdown interface for all users in MyTownsPage, showing the same searchable town selector that admin currently uses, even though the save functionality will not persist data until backend integration is completed in a future phase

new_feature_requests.summary: Extend towns module UI to all users (frontend only, no backend)
Connect backend for all users' default town selection (pending frontend completion)
